title: Travels in lands beyond the sea.
author: Linskill, Charles Dorrance.
snippet: He died July 22d, 1857. His skin is to be seen, stuffed, in the bar at Joseph Bryant' s 'Grey Horse' wine and spirit vaults, 53 Lime street, Liverpool, England."

title: Travels in Lands beyond the Sea. Beauty and Glory of Western Europe, etc
author: Linskill, Charles D.
snippet: He died July 22d, 1857. Hisskin is to be seen, stuffed, in the bar at Joseph Bryant's 'Grey Horse' wine and spirit vaults, 53 Limestreet, Liverpool, England."
